title: Court upholds $236M verdict in Exxon Mobil pollution case
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Business - Today 
New Hampshire's highest court upheld a record $236 million judgment Friday against Exxon Mobil for its use of a gasoline additive that conta...
